ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Hangouts for teens
ygData.msgSnippet: Paludal Caverns is a great place to level up. If you want to do a little solo action then check out KFC, (The Krags base), in S Karana. Durgaa 24th season
ygData.messageBody:
Paludal Caverns is a great place to level up. If you want to do a little
solo action then check out KFC, (The Krags base), in S Karana.

Durgaa
24th season Ranger

> -----Original Message-----
> Message: 1
> Date: Thu, 18 Dec 2003 19:56:21 -0600
> From: "Techpriest" <techpriest@...>
> Subject: Hangouts for teens
>
> I am fairly new to EQ and have been trying various class-race
> combos to see what I like. I now have three character
> between level 10 and 15. I have been going to Crushbone alot
> to hunt, and the tower in the field of bone is cool but I am
> getting tired of the same old stuff. Where else can a
> character in the 10-20 range go to hunt where he can find a
> group easily? I have looked over the EQ Atlas and see a lot
> of stuff for 1-10 and 30+. Since I may try some more
> class-race combos before I try and take anybody over 20 I
> could use some more places to fill the gap between newbie and
> experienced. I am not interested in power-leveling.
>
> I have EQ Evolution, so every expansion but LDON. I play on
> the Tunare
> (sp?) server.
>
> Thanks!
